title: [BUG] Forms.Android: GPU backed canvas is blank after power off and on
body: **Description** If you use a GPU backed canvas (SKGLView) and power off the device and again on, the canvas is blank. If you than call an `InvalidateSurface()` or go to home and come back again, the canvas is redrawn correct. **Code** You could use my [SkiaTest](https://github.com/charlenni/SkiaTest), where a GPU and a CPU backed canvas could used beside each other. **Expected Behavior** GPU backed canvas should be redrawn as the CPU backed canvas. **Actual Behavior** GPU backed canvas isn't redrawn. **Basic Information** - Version with issue: 1.68.2-preview.60 - Last known good version: Didn't saw any - IDE: Visual Studio 16.5.4 - Platform Target Frameworks: In this case Android - Android: 9.0 - Target Devices: Huawei P8 lite 2017 - Target Devices: Simulator Nexus 4 with Android 5.0 (there even if a go to home and come back) - Target Devices: Simulator Pixel 2 with Android 9.0 **Screenshots** Looks like but should look like Second image is created after changing to home and back again **Reproduction Link** See [SkiaTest](https://github.com/charlenni/SkiaTest).
